mapper.select: SELECT bi.item_code, bi.item_name, bla.lot01, bl.loc_code, il.qty, il.qty_in, il.qty_out, il.qty_rep_in, il.qty_rep_out, il.qty_lock, il.is_lock, il.wh_id FROM INV_LOC il LEFT JOIN BAS_ITEM bi ON bi.ITEM_ID = il.ITEM_ID left JOIN BAS_LOCATION bl on bl.loc_id = il.loc_id LEFT JOIN BAS_LOT_ATT bla ON bla.lot_id = il.lot_id where bi.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
